name: snowtooth-federation-lab
description: Federated GraphQL services for snowtooth mountain

scripts.install: cd lifts; npm i; cd ../trails; npm i
scripts.start:
echo '

You must start each services independently. 
1. Navigate to the lifts folder and run `npm start`
2. then, in another terminal, navigate to the trails folder and run `npm start`.


'

author: Moon Highway
